snippet.title: Blood & Play - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Meet Santiago Delgado and Matikas Baccay in this trailer for Blood & Play, an upcoming gay, safe for work, T4T visual novel about the intersection between debt, disability, & transgender healthcare that can be a romantic-comedy or a macabre psychological horror story depending on how you guide Santiago to interpret an offer that's hard to ignore. Blood & Play will be available on Steam (Windows PC, Mac, Linux, and Android).
